ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NotApplicable__c =TRUE, NOT(ISNEW()), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2EnrolledInMedicalServicesPlan__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2DateOfBirth__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2GivenName__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2Surname__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2MiddleName__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2PersonalHealthNumber__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2Address__CountryCode__s))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2Address__StateCode__s))), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2Address__City__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2Address__Street__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Applicant2Address__PostalCode__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2Patient__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2ReceivedFunding__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Ap2PrivateInsuranceCoverageForIVF__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2RequiredDiagnosticsCompleted__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Applicant2MedicallyEligible__c))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Applicant2 Details Should not be filled if it is not applicable
